name: Thinking Face
baseMeaning: A yellow face with a single finger resting on its chin and a raised eyebrow.
tldr: Shows contemplation, skepticism, or 'hmm'. Can be genuinely curious or subtly doubtful.

contextMeanings.meaning: Expressing skepticism or doubt about a statement.
Subtly questioning someone's logic or honesty.
Pretending to think about something obvious.

generationalNotes.note: Frequently used for skepticism or subtle shade.
Used for both genuine thinking and skepticism.

warnings.title: Skeptical undertone
warnings.description: Often implies doubt about what someone said. May come across as questioning their honesty.
